languages.text: После гибели своего хозяина или хозяйки он склонил группу товарищей на захват торгового судна, на котором занялся грабежом и пиратством, в коих весьма преуспел.
After the death of his master or mistress, he persuaded a group of associates to capture a trading vessel, using it for piracy and larceny, in which he found great success.
languages.original_text: После гибели своего хозяина или хозяйки он склонил группу товарищей на захват торгового судна, на котором занялся грабежом и пиратством, в коих весьма преуспел.

traits.locale_text: After the death of his master or mistress, he persuaded a group of associates to capture a trading vessel and used it for piracy and larceny, in which he found great success.
After the death of his master or mistress, he persuaded a group of associates to capture a trading vessel and used it for piracy and larceny, in which he found great success.

After the death of his master or mistress, he persuaded a group of associates to capture a trading vessel, using it for piracy and larceny, in which he found great success.
After the death of his master or mistress, he persuaded a group of associates to capture a trading vessel, using it for piracy and larceny, in which he found great success.

languages.text: 弗拉魔的主人死了之后，他说服了一帮人，合伙占领了一艘商船，利用这艘船进行劫掠，取得了巨大的成功。
languages.original_text: After the death of his master or mistress, he persuaded a group of associates to capture a trading vessel, using it for piracy and larceny, in which he found great success.

traits.locale_text: 弗拉魔的主人死了之后，他说服了一帮人，合伙占领了一艘商船，利用这艘船进行劫掠，取得了巨大的成功。

languages.text: Nach dem Tod seines Herren oder seiner Herrin überzeugte er eine Gruppe von Verbündeten, ein Handelsschiff zu kapern und sich als Räuber und Piraten zu betätigen — was sie auch mit großem Erfolg taten.
languages.original_text: After the death of his master or mistress, he persuaded a group of associates to capture a trading vessel, using it for piracy and larceny, in which he found great success.

traits.locale_text: Nach dem Tod seines Herren oder seiner Herrin überzeugte er eine Gruppe von Verbündeten, ein Handelsschiff zu kapern und sich als Räuber und Piraten zu betätigen — was sie auch mit großem Erfolg taten.

languages.text: Après la mort de son maître ou de sa maîtresse, il persuada un groupe de complices de capturer un vaisseau de commerce qu'il utilisa pour commettre toutes sortes de larcins et se livrer à la piraterie, vie dans laquelle il connut un grand succès.
languages.original_text: After the death of his master or mistress, he persuaded a group of associates to capture a trading vessel, using it for piracy and larceny, in which he found great success.

traits.locale_text: Après la mort de son maître ou de sa maîtresse, il persuada un groupe de complices de capturer un vaisseau de commerce qu'il utilisa pour commettre toutes sortes de larcins et se livrer à la piraterie, vie dans laquelle il connut un grand succès.

languages.text: Después de la muerte de su amo o ama, convenció a un grupo de conocidos para capturar una nave comercial y usarla para la piratería y el hurto, con lo que cosechó un gran éxito.
languages.original_text: After the death of his master or mistress, he persuaded a group of associates to capture a trading vessel, using it for piracy and larceny, in which he found great success.

traits.locale_text: Después de la muerte de su amo o ama, convenció a un grupo de conocidos para capturar una nave comercial y usarla para la piratería y el hurto, con lo que cosechó un gran éxito.

languages.text: 主人がこの世を去った後、男は仲間を説得して貿易船を略奪し、それを海賊行為や窃盗に用いることで大きな成功を収めた。
languages.original_text: After the death of his master or mistress, he persuaded a group of associates to capture a trading vessel, using it for piracy and larceny, in which he found great success.

traits.locale_text: 主人がこの世を去った後、男は仲間を説得して貿易船を略奪し、それを海賊行為や窃盗に用いることで大きな成功を収めた。

languages.text: Kendisi, efendisinin ölümünden sonra bir grup iş birlikçiyle bir ticaret gemisi kaçırıp onu korsanlık ve hırsızlık yapmakta kullandı. Bunda da epey başarılı oldu.
languages.original_text: After the death of his master or mistress, he persuaded a group of associates to capture a trading vessel, using it for piracy and larceny, in which he found great success.

traits.locale_text: Efendisinin ölümünden sonra bir grup iş birlikçisiyle birlikte bir ticaret gemisi kaçırdı ve onu korsanlık ve hırsızlık yapmakta kullandı, ki bu işte oldukça da başarılı oldu.
